text: Some might say we never quite grew up. As kids we fell in love with the classic sour belts from the corner candy shop and have never quite let go. All grown up we searched and searched for that classic sour belt: just the right amount of sour, the perfect texture and snap when you take a bite... and Zweet was born! Available in an ever-growing variety of flavors and styles that will satisfy every craving, Zweet has grown to more than just sour belts - including gummies, snackable marshmallows, chews and more! We're constantly innovating to bring new flavors and products to make life even Zweet-er! We've got sweet treats for everyone! Whether you're looking for super sour belts, soft and tasty gummies, or marshmallows for your next camping trip, Zweet has got that sweet tooth covered!
